render_info.source_dynamic: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY news.IncurredDTG desc ) AS STT, news.IncurredDTG as NgayPhatSinh , news.Name as TenSuVu , case news.NegativeType when 1 then N'Chưa lên báo' when 2 then N'Đã lên báo' else '' end as LoaiSuVu , case news.Classification when 1 then N'Quan trọng' when 2 then N'Trung bình' when 3 then N'Bình thường' else '' end as MucDoSuVu , case news.Status when 1 then N'Đang xử lý' when 1 then N'Hoàn thành' else '' end as TinhTrang --, news.RatedLevel as DanhGiaChiTiet , news.PressAgency as CoQuanBaoChiLienHe --, news.Resolution as DeXuatPhuongAnXuLy , news.Concluded as KetQua --, (select count(1) from NegativeNews negaNews where negaNews.NewsID = news.NewsID and negaNews.Deleted = 0) as SoTinChiTiet from News news where news.Deleted = 0 and news.Type = 1 Order by news.IncurredDTG desc
